author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aspen Insurance Issued Notice Of Partial Redemption In Connection With Election To Redeem $125 Million Of $250 Million 6.00% Senior Notes Due 2020
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Aspen Insurance Holdings Ltd:
* ASPEN INSURANCE HOLDINGS - ISSUED NOTICE OF PARTIAL REDEMPTION IN CONNECTION WITH ELECTION TO REDEEM $125 MILLION OF $250 MILLION 6.00% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2020
* ASPEN INSURANCE HOLDINGS LTD - REDEMPTION IS EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE ON JUNE 18, 2018 Source text: ( bit.ly/2Ik4vo2 ) Further company coverage:
